changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: CREATE TEMP TABLE temp_orcids_to_clean AS (SELECT orcid FROM profile WHERE profile_deactivation_date IS NOT NULL);
UPDATE record_name SET credit_name=null, given_names='Given Names Deactivated', family_name='Family Name Deactivated' WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
UPDATE email SET visibility='PRIVATE' WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
UPDATE biography SET biography='', visibility='PRIVATE' WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM address WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM external_identifier WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM other_name WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM profile_keyword WHERE profile_orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM researcher_url WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM org_affiliation_relation WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM profile_funding WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM peer_review WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
DELETE FROM work WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
UPDATE profile SET activities_visibility_default='PRIVATE', indexing_status='REINDEX' WHERE orcid in (select orcid from temp_orcids_to_clean);
